title: Hydrothermal liquefaction integrated with wastewater treatment plants – life cycle assessment and technoeconomic analysis of process system options
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01211E, Paper

Paraskevi Karka, Ib Johannsen, Stavros Papadokonstantakis
GHG emission savings and production costs of biofuels via Hydrothermal Liquefaction (HTL) of sewage sludge present a potential degree of competitiveness.
